content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Steps 88-95)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (14.5, 8.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (14.5, 8.0) (status: FULL_OUTPUT)
- Steam engine at (17.5, 8.5) (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- Small electric poles at (19.5, 9.5) and (17.5, 11.5)
- Partial water pipe connection from offshore pumps

### Secondary Boiler at position (14.5, 11.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (14.5, 11.0) (status: NOT_CONNECTED)
- No steam engine or proper connections

### New Boiler at position (5.5, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Boiler at (5.5, 0.0) (status: NOT_CONNECTED, warnings: no input liquid)
- Connection points at (3.5, 0.5) and (7.5, 0.5)
- Steam output point at (5.5, -1.5)

### Oil Processing Complex
Consists of:
- Oil refinery at (15.5, 15.5) (status: NO_POWER, recipe: BasicOilProcessing)
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) (status: NO_POWER)
- Partial pipe network for crude oil (status: EMPTY)
- Storage tank at (10.5, 15.5)
- Missing power connections throughout

### Chemical Plant Complex at position (6.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Chemical plant (status: NO_POWER, recipe: sulfur)
- Small electric poles at (8.5, 10.5), (8.5, 13.5), and (7.5, 14.5)
- Missing petroleum gas input and power

### Water Pipe Network
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -2.5) (status: WORKING)
- Working pipe group at (-8.5, -2.5) (status: FULL_OUTPUT)
- Multiple empty pipe groups throughout the map

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent Placement Issues
- Repeated attempts to place pipes on occupied tiles (1.0,-0.5) (steps 89, 90, 92)
- Attempted to place steam engine on occupied tile (4.0,0.0) (step 93)
- Implement tile availability check before placement attempts

### Distance Placement Errors
- Attempted offshore pump placement at (50,48) and (100,98) while too far (steps 88, 95)
- Attempted pumpjack placement at (20,40) while too far (step 91)
- Move within 10 tile range before attempting placements

### Resource Placement Errors
- Failed pumpjack placement at (15,15) due to water (step 94)
- Verify terrain suitability before placing resource extractors

### Persistent Issues from Previous Reports
- Placement on occupied tiles (still occurring)
- Power grid connectivity (still occurring)
- Connection point index errors (still occurring)
- Fluid system validation (still occurring)
